summary.subject: Special Issue on Software Engineering in Generative Art
summary.purpose: Call for Papers for a special issue in the IEEE Computer Magazine focusing on the intersection of software engineering and generative art. The issue aims to foster discussions among software engineers, generative artists, and caretakers about advancements in software technology within algorithmic art.
topics: Use of code in generative art
Software engineering concerns related to algorithmic art
Maintenance and preservation challenges of algorithmic artworks
Performance balancing for real-time interactions in artistic coding
